com.skratchdot.riff.wav

Interface RIFFWave

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RIFFWaveImpl

    public interface RIFFWave
    A representation of the model object 'RIFF Wave'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Chunks
    • Parse Chunk Exceptions
    • Size

    See Also:
    WavPackage.getRIFFWave()

      • getChunks

         getChunks()
        Returns the value of the 'Chunks' containment reference list. The list contents are of type Chunk.

        If the meaning of the 'Chunks' containment reference list isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...
